1.name: Pet Sematary
1.description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

2.name: Road House
2.description: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

3.name: Batman
3.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

4.name: Major League
4.description: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

5.name: Steel Magnolias
5.description: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

6.name: Dead Poets Society
6.description: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

7.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
7.description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

8.name: Back to the Future Part II
8.description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

9.name: The Little Mermaid
9.description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a human prince's love.

10.name: When Harry Met Sally...
10.description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

11.name: Field of Dreams
11.description: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

12.name: The Abyss
12.description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

13.name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
13.description: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

14.name: Society
14.description: An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

15.name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
15.description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

16.name: Say Anything...
16.description: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

17.name: The Karate Kid Part III
17.description: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

18.name: Do the Right Thing
18.description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

19.name: Weekend at Bernie's
19.description: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

20.name: The 'Burbs
20.description: An overstressed suburbanite and his fellow neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

21.name: Ghostbusters II
21.description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

22.name: Lethal Weapon 2
22.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

23.name: Licence to Kill
23.description: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

24.name: Teen Witch
24.description: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

25.name: Uncle Buck
25.description: Bachelor and all round slob, Buck, babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

26.name: Glory
26.description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

27.name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
27.description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

28.name: Troop Beverly Hills
28.description: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

29.name: Parenthood
29.description: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

30.name: Leviathan
30.description: An American deep-sea mining colony stumbles upon a sunken Soviet vessel hiding a horrific secret.

31.name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
31.description: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.

32.name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
32.description: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

33.name: Born on the Fourth of July
33.description: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

34.name: Next of Kin
34.description: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

35.name: The Punisher
35.description: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

36.name: My Left Foot
36.description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

37.name: Cyborg
37.description: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

38.name: Kiki's Delivery Service
38.description: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

39.name: Lean on Me
39.description: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school and he is determined to improve by any and all means.

40.name: Wild Orchid
40.description: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

41.name: Turner & Hooch
41.description: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.

42.name: Tango & Cash
42.description: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

43.name: Little Monsters
43.description: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

44.name: Always
44.description: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

45.name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
45.description: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

46.name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
46.description: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

47.name: Black Rain
47.description: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

48.name: Driving Miss Daisy
48.description: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

49.name: The Wizard
49.description: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

50.name: Kickboxer
50.description: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.
